metadata.dc:author: Guízar Vázquez, J
Rostenberg, I
Navarrete Cadena, C
Mora, G
metadata.dc:description: The present paper describes a homozygote patient for the gene of hemoglobin S. The patient is the first child of non-consanguineous parents. The family study revealed 11 heterozygote subjects for the sickle cell disease.
metadata.dc:title: Hemoglobina S. A propósito de una familia.
[Hemoglobin S. Apropos of a family].
metadata.dc:publisher: Boletin medico del Hospital Infantil de Mexico
